summary: High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for ebony mail
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=red]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]

[size=5] HD Retexture for ebonymail [/size]

  °°°  resolution 2048X2048
 
  °°° As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.
  
  °°°  This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, including remodeled mesh versions 
(for various body replacers) and mods using parts of the set.

  °°°  [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: chose which version you want to install ,black, gold or silver and use modmanager or open the chosen package with 7zip or winrar , drop \"textures\" inside data folder .

BOOTS GLOVES HELMET YOU SEE IN SCREENSHOT SECTION ARE FROM MY UPCOMING EBONY ARMOR RETEXTURE AND NOT INCLUDED HERE ,THIS WORK REPLACES EBONY MAIL,THE DAEDRIC ARTIFACT IN BOETHIAH QUEST

[center][youtube]PyLXvyd9RdY[/youtube] [youtube]AcegR4HwyJc[/youtube] [youtube]B4OVAGjvvIc[/youtube]  [/center]
